_sText:
Hello folks, this is my first public release.  An arena style combat surf map with a unique jail-trap/release system.  Spawns are located on opposite sides of the map.  Each spawn features a week boost that may be hit with a telehop found in the middle of the map, if hit properly you may find yourself with a ton of speed and air thrusting towards the arena area.  

At the initial choke-point you will find an AK-47, M4A1, or M3.  Below the initial choke-point is a teleport to the top & a Scout + Deagles lined up on a bench + a teleport to the top.

There are four sniping pads at the very top with AWPs & 'wedge' boosters that you may use to fly across to the next pad.

There's a secret room that you must fly central high to reach.  The teleport to it is not visible, so don't expect to find it right away :-)

If there's any suggestions for feedback or improvements please get in touch with me and I will do what I can to improve the map.  Everybody's input is highly appreciated, and hopefully somebody can enjoy this map as much as I do.

**VERSION 2 CHANGES:**
1. Added additional boosts & wedge boosters for improved flow, also makes it easier to surf
2. Removed timed door from tube
3. Fixed cubemaps
4. Misc. minor details
